commit.message:
Auto merge of #79737 - Xanewok:update-rls, r=calebcartwright

Update RLS and Rustfmt

Fixes #79406 Fixes #79407

This does pull 1.4.28 version of Rustfmt. Do you want me to pull the 1.4.29 while we're at it?

r? `@calebcartwright`
